titles.title: Supporting Families through Addiction Act of 2023
Supporting Families through Addiction Act of 2023
A bill to establish a grant program for family community organizations that provide support for individuals struggling with substance use disorder and their families.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Supporting Families through Addiction Act of 2023
This bill directs the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration to award grants to certain nonprofits to develop or expand services for individuals with substance use disorders and their families.
